column1: Ramagundam experiences dry inland climatic conditions with hot summers and cool winters. The city of Ramagundam gets most of its rainfall from the Southwest monsoon. The summer season is extremely hot
column2: but temperatures decline with the onset of the monsoons
column3: and the winter season is generally cool. The most popular season for tourism is from November to February.
